title: Ep 166: Disrupting the Manicure
itunes:title: Ep 166: Disrupting the Manicure
itunes:subtitle: Olive & June CEO and founder Sarah Gibson Tuttle shares tricks for DIY-ing your mani, explains how to find an ethical nail salon, and offers invaluable advice to budding entrepreneurs. Before that: thoughts on Lady Gaga’s new makeup line a...
description:
Olive & June CEO and founder Sarah Gibson Tuttle shares tricks for DIY-ing your mani, explains how to find an ethical nail salon, and offers invaluable advice to budding entrepreneurs. Before that: thoughts on Lady Gaga’s new makeup line and the beauty world's butt wars (really).


Want more Fat Mascara?
